1000101100101010 1001011001000110 1 -> sum: 0010000101110001, cout: 1

1110010011100100 1110011010000000 0 -> sum: 1100101101100100, cout: 1
0011010101000101 0101000111011010 0 -> sum: 1000011100011111, cout: 0
0110111111110001 1001111000000010 1 -> sum: 0000110111110100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
